author: Lily Cartelet <flowercartelet@gmail.com>
description: かーたんのほーむぺーじ
name: flowercartelet.github.io

scripts.build: npm run build:script && npm run build:manifest && npm run build:index
scripts.build:manifest: echo "export default {\"script.js\":\"/asset/script.js?$(cat asset/script.js | openssl dgst -sha512)\",\"style.css\":\"/asset/style.css?$(cat asset/style.css | openssl dgst -sha512)\"};" > asset/manifest.js
